children.q: R::`view`:(count(`view_id`) as count1) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `view_error_count` > 0 and `sdk_name` IN ['df_miniapp_rum_sdk','df_uniapp_rum_sdk']}
R::view:(count(view_id) as count2) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `sdk_name` IN ['df_miniapp_rum_sdk','df_uniapp_rum_sdk']}

query.q: eval(A/B, alias='错误率', A="R::`view`:(count(`view_id`) as count1) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `view_error_count` > 0 and `sdk_name` IN ['df_miniapp_rum_sdk','df_uniapp_rum_sdk']}", B="R::view:(count(view_id) as count2) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `sdk_name` IN ['df_miniapp_rum_sdk','df_uniapp_rum_sdk']}")

children.q: R::`view`:(count(`view_id`)) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `view_error_count` > 0 and `sdk_name` IN ['df_miniapp_rum_sdk','df_uniapp_rum_sdk']} by view_name

R::error:(count(resource_status)) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `device` = '#{device}' and model = '#{model}'  and `error_source` = 'network' and `sdk_name` IN ['df_miniapp_rum_sdk','df_uniapp_rum_sdk']} by resource_status

charts.name: 受影响的资源错误统计

query.q: R::error:(count_distinct(session_id) as `错误会话数`) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `device` = '#{device}' and model = '#{model}' and `error_source` = '#{error_source}' and `error_source` = 'network' and `sdk_name` IN ['df_miniapp_rum_sdk','df_uniapp_rum_sdk']} by resource_url_path_group

R::error:(count(resource_status) as `错误数`) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `device` = '#{device}' and model = '#{model}' and `error_source` = '#{error_source}' and `error_source` = 'network' and `sdk_name` IN ['df_miniapp_rum_sdk','df_uniapp_rum_sdk']} by resource_url_path_group

R::error:(count(error_type) as `错误数`) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `device` = '#{device}' and model = '#{model}' and `error_source` != 'network' and `sdk_name` IN ['df_miniapp_rum_sdk','df_uniapp_rum_sdk']} by error_type

charts.name: 不同版本 JS 错误数统计
